info.name: MemeSounds
info.description: Plays Memetastic sounds depending on what is being sent in chat. This was heavily inspired by the idea of Metalloriff's bruh plugin so please go check him out!

changelog.title: New Stuff!?
items: Mario saying YAHOO!, okiedokie, and hello in Mario64.
Ness saying 'ok' from super smash bros.
The most iconic part of 'moonmen' from basically every vsauce video.
**NOTE: this plays when someone says 'what if' and is currently DISABLED by default!**

changelog.title: Improvements
items: You can now toggle individual sounds on and off! Credits to **0x00sec** on discord.
Modified some sound lengths and added sound file metadata.

changelog.title: On-Going
items: Stuff is *totally* going on over here.
